titles.title: Gun Safety Incentives Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the use of safety devices in firearms.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/18/2002--Introduced. Gun Safety Incentives Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a business tax credit for the incorporation of chamber load indicators and qualified chamber blocking devices in the manufacture of firearms.
